description:
• First of all, I would share a coupon discount for only $10 for you guys.

This course is described in the simplest ways, and is the comprehensive and straight forward course for totally beginners to create a real world website. HTML and CSS are the two easiest languages of web development. The course covers all the small and big concepts of HTML and CSS and leaves no stone unturned. Whether you are a newbie or have some basic syntax idea then this course is for you to boost your skills and make things in real life.

This course has more than 70 lectures and more than 7 hours of video content plus this course also include assignments, test cases and of course final project where we would be creating BBC News Website.

You will get lifetime access to over 70 lectures plus corresponding Notebooks for the lectures!

This course comes with a 30 day money back guarantee! If you are not satisfied in any way, you'll surely get your money back. Remember this is the basic building of web development, based on these concepts of HTML and CSS you can step into next phase of web development.
title: Learn HTML and CSS to make a Website
